imdb.plot outline: Travel down America's mother road, Route 66, to select destinations including Chicago, St. Louis, Tulsa, Texas, New Mexico, Arizona and Santa Monica, California. Stop to discover the unique look, history, food, & folklore of each town. This series is a mix of concert and travel, creating a dynamic new format never before seen on television.
imdb.title: Rhythms of the Road
plot: Travel down America's mother road, Route 66, to select destinations including Chicago, St. Louis, Tulsa, Texas, New Mexico, Arizona and Santa Monica, California.
